Sentencas: Effects of tensile strain induced by the dispersion of Au nanoparticles in Pr2NiO4-based oxide on the oxygen reduction reaction were investigated.
Titulo: Strain Effects on Oxygen Reduction Activity of Pr2NiO4 Caused by Gold Bulk Dispersion for Low Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Au-dispersed Pr1.9Ni0.71Cu0.41Ga0.05O4+delta (PNCG) showed a much decreased cathodic overpotential, and a cell using Au-dispersed PNCG showed a significantly higher power density, approximately 2.5 times higher than that of a cell using PNCG without dispersed Au.
Titulo: Strain Effects on Oxygen Reduction Activity of Pr2NiO4 Caused by Gold Bulk Dispersion for Low Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The smallest overpotential was achieved at 3-5 mol % dispersion of Au nanoparticles, at which the largest tensile strain was observed.
Titulo: Strain Effects on Oxygen Reduction Activity of Pr2NiO4 Caused by Gold Bulk Dispersion for Low Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Impedance measurements suggested that the impedance arc in the lower frequency range was mainly decreased; therefore, the increased activity to oxygen reduction was attributed to the increased bulk and surface diffusivity of oxide ions.
Titulo: Strain Effects on Oxygen Reduction Activity of Pr2NiO4 Caused by Gold Bulk Dispersion for Low Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Electron energy loss spectroscopy (EELS) shows that oxygen in the strained region was in a more reduced state and this oxygen could be assigned to interstitial oxygen which is highly mobile.
Titulo: Strain Effects on Oxygen Reduction Activity of Pr2NiO4 Caused by Gold Bulk Dispersion for Low Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In addition, density functional theory (DFT) analysis suggested that bond destabilization was attributed to the increase in energy of occupied pi* orbitals of surface peroxo species on tensile strained surfaces.
Titulo: Strain Effects on Oxygen Reduction Activity of Pr2NiO4 Caused by Gold Bulk Dispersion for Low Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Therefore, increased cathodic performance of PNCG by Au nanoparticle dispersion could be assigned to the increased diffusivity by tensile strain.
Titulo: Strain Effects on Oxygen Reduction Activity of Pr2NiO4 Caused by Gold Bulk Dispersion for Low Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
